General.Name: Beijing Urban Construction Investment & Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Urban Construction Investment & Development Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development and management businesses in China. It is involved in the development of residential, apartments, villas, hotels, office buildings, cultural tourism, malls, and other properties. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 11, Beitucheng West Road, Beijing, China, 100029
